prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with elegant flowing fins and a vibrant color palette.
Imagine a playful fish Pokemon that has a striking white and orange design.
Show me a Pokemon that thrives in aquatic environments, sporting beautiful scales.
Design a small water creature that has unique fins and a cheerful demeanor.
Generate a Pokemon that looks like a goldfish, with a vibrant and eye-catching appearance.
Make a Pokemon that embodies grace and fluidity, perfect for swimming.
Give me a Pokemon with a charming smile and a mix of bright colors.
